21735.「おお <pc>。来てくれたか。\n じつはな そちに 頼みがある。\n これが:
Ah, <pc>, it's you. There's a favor I
must ask of you. This will be my final
request...

21736.「余の最後の頼みとは……\n 我が祖国 ガテリア皇国を探す\n 手伝いをしてほし:
My last request...is for you to help me find
my homelandーthe Gateria Empire.

21737.「……みなまで申すな。\n ガテリアが すでに存在しないのは 重々承知。\n し:
Yes, I know... I'm well aware that it no
longer exists today. However...

21738.「ウルベア同様 朽ち果てた姿の……。\n そう。ガテリア皇国の 遺跡ならば\n:
It is in a state of ruin, much like Urbea...
Perhaps we can find it within the ruins?

21739.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。\n かつて 父上や母上 そして……\n リウ老:
My homeland as it is nowーthe place I once
lived with my mother, my father, and Master
Liu... I wished to see it.

21740.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
Within the throne room of my homeland is where those dear to me were. If I can just be reminded of that, then perhaps I can
find the way forward...

21741.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て\n ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てに:
From Urbea's ruins, the ruins of Gateria must
lie to the east of the Boronus Lava Flow,
on the continent's western edge.

21742.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ:
Find the ruins of Gateria and lead me to the
throne room, <pc>. Would you please
grant me this final request?

21743.「そうか！ やってくれるか！\n 本当に…… 本当に\n そちに 出会えて よか:
So you'll really do it then?!
I...I am truly glad to have met you!

21744.「それでは ボロヌス溶岩流に行き\n ガテリアの遺跡を探すとしよう。\n 余は:
Let's make our way to the Boronus Lava Flow
to search for the ruins there. I will follow
behind you.

21746.「話を聞いてりゃ アンタ……。\n 身寄りが いねえみたいですなッ！: From what I hear, you don't got any family!

21747.「もし 行くあてがねえんなら\n 養子にでもしてやるでごぜえますよッ！\n ここ:
If you've got nowhere else to go, then I'll
just adopt you! Think of this place as your
new home!

21749.「カッ カン違いしねえでくだせえッ！\n わしは アンタの その…ガラクタの知識:
D-don't get the wrong idea!
I just value your... Your knowledge
of junk, that's all!

21750.「ダストン殿……。\n 見かけによらず 貴公は 優しいのであるな。\n その申し:
Mr. Duston... You are much kinder than you
appear. I am truly grateful for your offer.

21751.「……じゃが 余は 行かねばならぬ。\n 祖国の今を 見届けねば 余の時間は\n:
...But I must go. If I don't see my country as
it is now, then I will forever feel stuck...

21752.「<pc>よ。それでは 参ろうか。\n 目指すは ボロヌス溶岩流の東に眠る\n:
Shall we go, then? We must find the ruins of
Gateria that lie to the east of the Boronus
Lava Flow.

21753.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 他の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from others to help me
with mine.

21754.「まあ こちらは 一刻を争うわけでもない。\n 急ぎの依頼を 片付けたら\n 余:
Well, I'm in no rush. If you manage to
finish your more pressing matters, then
you can help me.

21755.「……そうかえ。\n ならば いたしかたなし。\n そちの気が変わるまで 待つこ:
...I see. So be it. I will wait here until you
change your mind.

21756.「おお <pc>。\n 余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡を探す\n 手伝いをしてくれ:
You've come back. Have you decided you wish
to help me in finding the ruins of my
homeland?

21757.「余は 見てみたくなったのじゃ。\n かつて 父上や母上 そして……\n リウ老:
My homeland as it is nowーthe place I once
lived with my mother, my father, and Master
Liu... I wished to see it.

21758.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
Within the throne room of my homeland is where those dear to me were. If I can just be reminded of that, then perhaps I can
find the way forward...

21759.「ウルベア地下遺跡のある場所から見て\n ガテリアの遺跡は この大陸の西の果てに:
From Urbea's ruins, the ruins of Gateria must
lie to the east of the Boronus Lava Flow,
on the continent's western edge.

21760.「<pc>よ。ガテリアの遺跡を見つけ\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ:
Find the ruins of Gateria and lead me to the
throne room, <pc>. Would you please
grant me this final request?

21761.「余の祖国 ガテリア皇国の遺跡は\n きっと この大陸の西の果てにある\n ボロ:
The ruins of Gateria must lie to the east
of the Boronus Lava Flow, which is on
the continent's western edge.

21762.「余と共に ボロヌス溶岩流に行き\n ガテリアの遺跡を見つけたら\n 奥の玉座の:
If you come with me to find the ruins, please
take me to the throne room inside.

21763.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
Within the throne room of my homeland is where those dear to me were. If I can just be reminded of that, then perhaps I can
find the way forward...

21764.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。\n 頼んだぞよ <pc>。:
This is my final request...
Please do me this favor.

21765.「そちのおかげで ボロヌス溶岩流に眠る\n ガテリア皇国の遺跡は 見つかったぞよ:
We were able to find the ruins of Gateria,
thanks to you! I'm filled with true joy.

21766.「あとは その奥にあるはずの\n 玉座の間まで 余を 連れていってたもれ。:
Please take me to the throne room, which
should be deep within the ruins.

21767.「祖国の玉座の間には 親しい者たちがいた。\n 彼らの思い出に ふれることができ:
Within the throne room of my homeland is where those dear to me were. If I can just be reminded of that, then perhaps I can
find the way forward...

21768.「これが 余の最後の頼みじゃ……。\n 頼んだぞよ <pc>。:
This is my final request...
Please do me this favor.

21769.「おお……！ ついに……\n ついに 見つけてくれたのじゃな……。\n <pc>: Oh...at last!! At last...we've found it...

21770.「かように 変わり果てても\n 悲しいほど 余には わかるぞえ……。:
Even changed beyond recognition, I can
still sadly tell...

21771.「まちがいない。\n この地こそ 我が祖国ガテリアじゃ……。:
I've no doubt... This is Gateria...
my homeland.

21772.「祖国といえど 父上も母上も……\n 親しい者は 皆 すでに ここにはおらぬ。\:
My father, mother, and all those dear to
me...they're no longer. I knew it would
be so, yet it still pains me to think about...

21773.「……さあ <pc>。\n 余を 玉座の間まで 連れていってたもれ。\n きっと:
Come on, <pc>. Take me to the throne
room. I'm certain it's further inside.

21775.「この部屋こそ 余の思い出が詰まった\n ガテリア皇国の玉座の間……。\n つい:
We've finally arrived...the throne room of
Gateria. I'm flooded with memories of this
place...

21776.「……こうしていると 在りし日のガテリアが\n 目に 浮かぶようじゃ。:
When I sit here, I can vividly see Gateria
in its days of glory...

21777.「……父上が 威風堂々と玉座に座ると\n その隣で 母上が 余に笑いかけた。\n:
Father would sit in his throne in all his
majesty, and Mother would be next to him,
smiling at me...

21778.「決まった時間になると リウ老師が\n 嬉しそうに 余を迎えにくる……。:
And at the appointed time, Master Liu would
come to greet me with a smile on his face as
well...

21779.「なんと… なんと懐かしく……。\n はかない光景なのじゃ……。:
How...how nostalgic it is...
A short-lived sight of what once was...

21781.「余が ここに来た 本当の理由は……:
The true reason I wanted to come here is
because...

21784.「ど どこから わいて 出おった！？\n かような お化けフンコロガシ……\n:
J-just where did you come from?! Some kind
of ghostly dung beetle...?! I've never seen
such a thing in my Gateria!

21785.「<cs_pchero> 頼むッ！！\n 神聖な玉座の間を汚す 不届き者の\n:
You dare defile this throne room?!
Please, <cs_pchero>! You must strike
down this scoundrel!

21786.「よいか <cs_pchero>！\n あの お化けフンコロガシを見かけたら\n:
Listen well, <cs_pchero>! If you see
that ghostly dung beetle again, be sure it
gets what's coming to it!

21788.「で 出たぁぁぁッ！！\n 頼んだぞよ <cs_pchero>！！:
I-it's here!!
You're my only hope!

21789.「おお！ 不届きな お化けフンコロガシを\n 見事 成敗してくれたようじゃな！\:
Ohh!! You managed to strike down that
scoundrel of a dung beetle! Well done!

21790.「……かような化け物が すみつくとは\n 本当に ガテリアは 時代から\n 見捨:
If such a monster wanders around here, then
Gateria truly has been lost to time...

21791.「……<cs_pchero>よ。\n 今こそ 余が ここへ来た\n 本当の理由を:
Right. I will now tell you the true reason
I wanted to come here.

21792.「余は……\n ここで 自らの生を 終えようと思う。:
I... I think this is where I will end my
own life.

21793.「止めないでたもれ……！\n 大事な者たちとの思い出に ふれながら\n この世を:
Do not try and stop me! If I can leave this
world with the memories of those dear to
me...then that's all I could ask for.

21794.「そちには 本当に世話になった。\n 心の底から 感謝してるぞよ。\n では さ:
Thank you for everything you've done for me.
I truly am in your debt.
Well, this is goodbye...

21797.「魔神兵……！？\n なぜ あの魔神兵が ガテリアにおる！？: An Aztech?! What is it doing here in Gateria?!

21798.「まさか リウ老師か！？\n この中に リウ老師が入っておるのか！？\n 早く…:
Can it be...Master Liu?! Is he inside?!
Quickly... Show me what lies inside!!

21799.「会いたかったぞよ！！\n リウ……: Master! I've missed you so much...

21801.「ふふふ……。やはり……な。\n 魔神兵の中は もぬけのカラ……。\n もう リ:
Heh... heh... Just as... I thought.
There's nothing inside... Master Liu is
no longer here...

21802.「……これは リウ老師の手紙か！？\n 老師が 余に 手紙を……！:
Is this a letter?! He's written something to
me!

21803.「……親愛なる我が主 ビャン・ダオさま。\n リウにございます。:
"To My Dear Lord Byan Dao,
This is Liu."

21804.「……ビャン皇子を魔神兵に乗せた後\n 私は このガテリアまで 戻ってまいりまし:
"After I helped you to board the Aztech, I
returned here to Gateria so that I could
keep my promise to meet you in the future."

21805.「……しかし 私は 魔神兵に乗れなかった。\n 皇子の後を追って 未来へ行くとい:
"...But I couldn't board my Aztech. I could
not choose the path of following you..."

21806.「私は 文明に影を落とした 技術者のひとり。\n その大いなる罪を つぐなうべく:
"I am one of the engineers who cast a shadow over our civilization. To atone for this irredeemable crime, I have made the decision
to end my life in this time..."

21807.「……皇子の生きる未来に\n 正しい文明の姿を 取り戻すため\n この身を賭して:
"I've made the decision to fight with all of
my strength, to restore civilization as it
once was for the sake of your future."

21809.「ドワーフたちが 同じ過ちを繰り返したとき\n あなたならば きっと 正しき道へ:
"When the Dwarves make the same mistakes yet
again, it is you who will be able to lead them
to righteousness..."

21811.「……ビャンさま。あなたが 成人したら\n とっておきの技術を 教えるという約束:
"Master Byan...do you remember the promise I
made to you? That I would teach you something
special when you came of age?"

21812.「今こそ その約束を果たすとき……。\n さあ 魔神兵の中に入っているモノを\n:
"I will finally fulfill that promise.
Please take what is left inside of the
Aztech..."

21814.「……かつて ドワーフたちは\n 他の種族と同じく 自らの手で タネを植え\n:
"In the past, Dwarvesーmuch like the other
racesーplanted their own seeds, and rejoiced
with their harvest."

21815.「……しかし 我らは 高度な技術におぼれ\n 自らのチカラで 成しとげる よろこ:
"However...we've become so drunk with advanced technology that we lost sight of accomplishing things on our own... The very essence of a
true civilization."

21816.「私が ビャンさまに託したかった技術とは……\n 自らのチカラで 生き抜く術だっ:
"The skill that I wanted to impart to you...
it's the means to survive with your own
strength."

21817.「ビャンさま…… どうか お元気で……。\n あなたとの約束を守れなかった\n:
"Lord Byan... Please, stay well...
And forgive me... I was not able to keep my
promise to you."

21818.「老師……。そなたは 何も わかっておらぬ。\n 余が欲しかったのは こんな手紙:
Master... You just don't get it, do you?
This is not the kind of letter I wanted...
Not like this...

21819.「リウ老師……。余は ただ 一目だけでも\n そなたに 会いたかったのじゃ……。:
Even if it was only for a single moment, I
just wanted to see you again...

21821.「……そなたは 望んでおったのだな。\n 技術に身をまかせた ゆがんだ時代を終わ:
This is what you longer for, isn't it? To end the twisted age of technology, so the world would become exactly how it is today...
I take back what I said before. I've decided that I will continue to live.
...I've grown curious. I want to see the world that you wished for, Master...
I wouldn't have been able to understand his teachings by simply reading that letter... But now I understand.
You and Chiri taught me the importance of living with my own strengthーwithout having to rely on technology...

21826.「<cs_pchero>。そちには 本当に世話になった。\n 感謝しても しきれ:
I truly am forever in your debt. Nothing I say
would ever be able to show just how thankful
I am, but this is the least I am able to do.

21827.「……余は これから リウ老師の教えに従い\n 旅に出ようと思う。この手で タネ:
I will embark on a journey while following what Master Liu had taught me. With my own hands, I will plant these seeds...and
with my own feet, I will find my place in this world.

21828.「ふふふ……。そちたちのおかげで\n 止まっていた余の時間が 動きだしたようじゃ:
Heh, heh... Because of you all, I no longer
feel stuck. My heart is just racing at the
thought of what I might encounter!

21829.「それでは また会おう！ <cs_pchero>よ！\n ガラクタ城の皆にも よ:
We will meet again, <cs_pchero>!
Give my regards to everyone at the Junk
Castle!
